channel.title: Oklahoma to consider allowing teachers to bring firearms to school
channel.description:
http://newsok.com/article/3738508
If this goes anywhere I think a lot of states are going to try and follow suit. What are your thoughts on this? I honestly think it's a load of shit. Kids steal stuff from teachers all the time, and there's been many events where teachers just go nuts and beat students. I barely trust some of the teachers here to teach a class, much less have a gun in their classroom.
